articles.title: 'It's terrifying': Merkel shaken as flood deaths rise to 188 in Europe - CNA
articles.description: FRANKFURT :Flash floods hit southern Germany on Sunday, killing at least one person and adding to the flooding devastation that has claimed the lives of more than 180 people in Europe in recent days.
